entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming clear before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
